/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/main.dir/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/ShaderProgram.cpp.o  -o main /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lrt -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXrandr.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXinerama.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXxf86vm.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXcursor.so
